titles.title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide for automatic continuing appropriations, to withhold the pay of the President and Members of Congress during any period in which such automatic continuing appropriations are in effect, and for other purposes.
Ensure Washington Funds Government Responsibly Act
Ensure Washington Funds Government Responsibly Act
Ensure Washington Funds Government Responsibly Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Reform, House Administration, and the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
